title: Mary Restaurant Vegetariano
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, American, Buffet, Salad bar, Mexican
description: A fully vegetarian restaurant in Puerto Vallarta. Spacious, bright and breezy with high ceilings. Offers wide variety of food, lots of veggie meats. All-you-can eat buffet 1-6pm, breakfast 9am-12pm.
streetAddress: Hondouras 309 Hotel Paloma del Mar, Planta Baja C
